title: Color her sunshine
creator_credit: Doris Lawrence, National Educational Television and WCET
brief_description: The story of Mary who was born with Down’s syndrome. Down’s syndrome children respond to individual love and attention, and are capable of taking care of themselves as they grow into adulthood. Mary is seen doing simple tasks in a sheltered workshop and participating in recreational activities.
